title: fosdem2008drupal
description:
Videos of 8 Drupal-related presentations at Fosdem 2008 in Brussels.

5) Introducing the Apache Solr Module by Robert Douglass

These videos can be viewed online at http://lvb.net/item/6026.  This torrent is offered for those who want to download the videos in order to view them offline.
